portfolios.name: O-Present Landing Page
portfolios.desc: A landing page for the O-Present Website application with the main aim of directing visitors to download the O-Present application. Created using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap Framework.

portfolios.name: O-Present
portfolios.desc: An open source application for web-based online presence needs, with GPS and selfie photo features. Created using MySQL, CodeIgniter 4, Myth/Auth, Tabler.io, jQuery, and WebcamJS.

portfolios.name: PT. Sumber Multi Era Motor Inventory System
portfolios.desc: An inventory management information system website for PT. Sumber Multi Era Motor, featuring allocation, transfer, sales, and return functionalities, designed for seamless integration across all branches. Created using MySQL, CodeIgniter 4, Myth/Auth, Tabler.io, and jQuery.

portfolios.name: KopiKing Company Profile
portfolios.desc: A website to display the (fictitious) company profile of Cafe KopiKing is designed to display menu information, our vision, customer testimonials, and a contact page. All content can be easily managed through an intuitive administrator interface. Created using MySQL, Laravel 10, and StartBootstrap.

portfolios.name: TasteTrack
portfolios.desc: A food recipe website utilizing the OMDB API as its data source, featuring recipe ideas and search functionality. Created using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap Framework, and JavaScript.

portfolios.name: Props Construction Company Profile
portfolios.desc: A website to display the (fictitious) Props Construction Company profile with about, services, projects and faq pages. Created using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap Framework, and JavaScript.

portfolios.name: Luxury Tailored Landing Page
portfolios.desc: A landing page for the (fictitious) Luxury Tailored Company with the main objective of directing visitors to subscribe to the latest news from Luxury Tailored. Created using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap Framework, and JavaScript.

portfolios.name: TriCalc
portfolios.desc: A website to help with the process of calculating the area and perimeter of a triangle to fulfill the Mini Coding Project from RevoU. Created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

portfolios.name: FlickSearch
portfolios.desc: A website that facilitates movie searching using the OMDB API as its data source. Created using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap Framework, and JavaScript.
